title: Voila
short: Presenting the Austin TX based Voila, for some fresh design inpiration
body: For today's inspiration, we have a neat one-page studio design: > Voila is Creative Duo based in Austin TX. We team up with startups and industries icons to help them build brands, products & marketing sites. Featuring gradient background text, smooth scroll animations, subtle zoom on image hover, fade transitions and a clean minimal design. [Check them out](https://studiovoila.com/)! ## Related Posts: * [Inspirational Agency Portfolio Websites (April 2020)](https://www.easeout.co/blog/2020-04-01-inspirational-agency-portfolio-websites-april-2020)
